alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Bexar; Comal; Kendall; Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:22PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A few strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Medina, east central Bandera, southern Kendall, western Bexar and west central Comal Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 320 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking two strong thunderstorms over Helotes and Borne, or 12 miles northwest of San Antonio, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Boerne, Castroville, Stinson Municipal Airport, San Antonio Int Airport, Leon Valley, Helotes, Fair Oaks Ranch, Alamo Heights, Bulverde, Shavano Park, Hollywood Park, Cross Mountain, Lytle, Olmos Park, Somerset, Natalia, Lacoste, Guadalupe River State Park and The Dominion. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
